title: Triple G. - WoW PvP and Arena Movie
description:
Last season I somehow managed to play all my Characters on a high enough rating to make them all gladiators and win 3 nice drakes. Thanks to all geeks that helped me by being the best teammates imaginable.

Nevertheless, this brought me to the idea to make a movie... and here it is.

------------------------------------------------------------

The Movie is divided in three Parts. 

First of all I start with some outdoor PvP and Battlegrounds. ( I know there are some undergeared opponents, just watch and don\&#039;t complain about that. Show me your movie where you only fight full gladiator geared players and I will delete this sentence :) ) 

In the second part you will see exclusively berserk and trinket useage in battlegrounds ( mostly WS ). 
                      !!WARNING!! 
[If you dont\&#039;t like partially undergeared opponents, berserk abuse, oneshots, high crits or lots of zooming, you should NOT download this movie or just skip it from minute 5 to 10 :)) ]

In the third part you will only see Arena PvP, I added some 2v2, 3v3 and 5v5. ( Note, that I usually play WITH nameplates, I just turned them OFF for this movie. I think nameplates would suck in it )

Ok, I think I said everything worth knowing according to the content.

------------------------------------------------------------
Music: 

Rammstein - Mein Herz brennt
Atreyu - My fork in the road ( your knife in my back )
Clawfinger - Do what I say
The RZA - Ode to Oren Ishii
Disturbed - Stricken
The Legion of Doom - Lolitas Medicine
Serj Tankian - Saving Us

                 !! WARNING !!
If you don\&#039;t like the music, I suggest to just turn your sound off and listen to your own tracks :p 
Don\&#039;t flame about that pls, it\&#039; s not that easy to come up with new music.

That\&#039;s it, Enjoy the movie!
